title: Bug 14197: Removing a working set immediately triggers refiltering in the package view
description: Bug 14197: When removing a working set, the package view in the background immediately refilters. This behavior should only occur when closing the working set selection dialog, not during manipulation. Additionally, pressing cancel should cancel any changes made to the working sets, including cancelling the remove operation.
OB: When I delete a working set, the package view in the background immediately undergoes refiltering.
EB: When I delete a working set, the package view in the background should not refilter immediately. It should only refilter when I close the working set selection dialog. Pressing cancel should also cancel any changes made to the working sets, including cancelling the remove operation.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a working set with one project and select it, observe that the package view is filtered.
2. Open the working set dialog again, create a second working set, and delete the first working set.
